version_description:
- Fix for renaming vehicles

Previous version updates include:
- Fix for lifting crashed trains from the track
- iOS9 compatibility
- Multi language fix
- 20th Anniversary level now playable by all
- Various other updates:
-- Underdog level fix
-- Temporary airstation removal
- Fixes for touches not working correctly (applies to 6S/6S+ only)
- Raised minimum iOS to 6.0

- Fix for renaming vehicles

- Raised minimum iOS to 6.0

- Fix for some crashes and other issues
